## Script Idea
Brief description of what the script should do.

## Purpose
What is the educational or testing purpose of this script?

## Proposed Implementation
Describe how you think the script should work:

```duckyscript
REM Example of script structure
DELAY 1000
GUI r
DELAY 500
STRING notepad
ENTER
```

- What precautions should users take?
- Any warnings needed?
